Description+: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your hand + [E].

Description: After consuming [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , gain Block equal to 10% of the amount consumed.
Every 100 [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] you use, gain [E] . Every !M! [E] you use, gain 1 stack of hsrmod:Brain-In-A-Vat.
Exhaust. For each card in your hand that uses [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , draw 1 card, gain [E] and !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] .
Gain !M! stacks of hsrmod:Brain-In-A-Vat.
Description+: Innate. Gain !M! stacks of hsrmod:Brain-In-A-Vat.

Description: Exhaust. Retain. Use !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , gain 1 stack of Intangible.
Description+: Retain. Use !M! [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] , gain 1 stack of Intangible, and the [hsrmod:ChargeIcon] required for this card doubles for the rest of the battle.
